short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show sign language videos when selecting text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your online experience with Esharaty, the groundbreaking Google Chrome extension that seamlessly integrates sign language videos into your web browsing. Say goodbye to language barriers and embrace inclusivity as Esharaty empowers you to understand and communicate more effectively.

Key Features:

Dynamic Sign Language Integration:
Esharaty works effortlessly in the background, waiting for your cues. Simply select any text on a webpage, and watch as relevant sign language videos instantly appear, providing a visual representation of the chosen content.

Multilingual Support:
Break down language barriers by choosing from a variety of sign languages. Esharaty supports American Sign Language (ASL), British Sign Language (BSL), and more, ensuring a diverse and inclusive experience for users worldwide.

Educational Insights:
Esharaty isn't just a tool; it's an educational resource. Explore the rich world of sign language effortlessly, as our extension provides insightful videos that enhance your understanding of this expressive form of communication.

Customizable Settings:
Tailor Esharaty to suit your preferences. Adjust the video playback speed, choose your preferred sign language dialect, or toggle on/off the extension with ease. Your browsing experience, your way.

Universal Accessibility:
Esharaty is designed with accessibility in mind. Whether you're a member of the Deaf community, a sign language enthusiast, or someone looking to broaden their cultural understanding, this extension is for you.

How to Use:

Install the Esharaty extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Select any text on a webpage.
Witness the magic unfold as Esharaty displays relevant sign language videos instantly.
Join the Esharaty community and foster a more inclusive online environment. Break down communication barriers, one selection at a time. Download Esharaty today!
